text: The Field is a 1990 Irish drama movie directed by Jim Sheridan and was based on the 1965 play of the same name by John B. Keane. It stars Richard Harris (in his Oscar nominated role), John Hurt, Sean Bean, Frances Tomelty, Brenda Fricker, Brendan Gleeson, Malachy McCourt, Tom Berenger. ==Other websites== * Category:1990 drama movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Jim Sheridan Category:Movies set in Ireland
title: The Field (movie)
